mapper.insert: insert into IPO_OUTBOUND (OUTBOUNDORDERID, DELIVERYORDERID, OUTBOUNDSTATE, OUTBOUNDDATE, OPERATORID, AUDITORID, WAREHOUSEID, DELIVERYPERSON, SEX, IDTYPE, IDNUM) values (#{outboundorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outboundstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outbounddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IPO_OUTBOUND set DELIVERYORDERID = #{deliveryorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTBOUNDSTATE = #{outboundstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OUTBOUNDDATE = #{outbounddate,jdbcType=DATE}, OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITORID = #{auditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSEID = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERYPERSON = #{deliveryperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OUTBOUNDORDERID = #{outboundorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select OUTBOUNDORDERID, DELIVERYORDERID, OUTBOUNDSTATE, OUTBOUNDDATE, OPERATORID, AUDITORID, WAREHOUSEID, DELIVERYPERSON, SEX, IDTYPE, IDNUM from IPO_OUTBOUND where OUTBOUNDORDERID = #{outboundorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
